# Similar to deadspin, gizmodo, lifehacker, etc.

title: //head/title
author: //meta[@name="author"]/@content
body: //div[contains(@class, 'post-content')]
strip: //div[contains(@class, 'content-summary')]

strip: //aside

test_url: https://news.theinventory.com/herman-miller-x-logitech-embody-gaming-chair-review-1845898043?ks=curation
